name: Demo Day Finalist: Forest Hero
description:
Forest Hero by Emma F.

Game Summary:

The Forest Hero is the only one who can save the Wikanogwa tribe and its village from a fire. They must dodge the evil creatures and fire and stop by some huts in the forest village to collect gems. The gems are keys to get into the house in the center of the village which has the button to extinguish the fire.

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right

  • Arrow keys to move and jump.
  • To complete the mission in go to each hut (see brown door) in counterclockwise order, starting with the bottom left hut.  
    • Then go to the hut on the bottom right, top right, and top left.
    • After collecting all gems, enter the hut in the center.
  • Click the "Go back outside" button when inside a hut to return.
  • Run into gems to collect them.
